column2: and you BEST be waking up early because this place get packed. My first time
column3: I went on a weekday at 9am and didn't have to wait. My second time
column4: it was 9am on a Saturday and we waited for 20-30 minutes. Don't let that discourage you though - there's indoor and outdoor seating
column5: and tables turn pretty quickly. Plus
column6: free coffee to help you unwind after your most likely damn-near-impossible quest to find a good parking spot.
